com.facebook.litho.testing.helper

Class ComponentTestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.testing.helper.ComponentTestHelper

  • public final class ComponentTestHelper
extends Object
    Helper class to simplify testing of components.

    Allows simple and short creation of views that are created and mounted in a similar way to how they are in real apps.

        @Deprecated
public static <T extends Component> Component getSubComponent(Component.Builder component,
                                                                          Class<T> componentClass)
        Deprecated. Use ComponentAssert#extractingSubComponents() instead.
        Returns the first subComponent of type class.
        Parameters:
        component - The component builder which to get the subcomponent from
        componentClass - the class type of the requested sub component
        Returns:
        The first instance of subComponent of type Class or null if none is present.

      • dispatchOnVisibleEvent

        @Deprecated
public static LithoView dispatchOnVisibleEvent(ComponentContext context,
                                                           EventHandler onVisibleHandler,
                                                           Component component)
        Deprecated. 
        Mounts the component & triggers the visibility event. Requires that the component supports incremental mounting.

        VisibleEvent

        DEPRECATED: Prefer using triggerVisibilityEvent(LithoView, Class) instead

        Parameters:
        context - A components context
        onVisibleHandler - SpecificComponent.onVisible(component)
        component - The component builder which to get the subcomponent from
        Returns:
        A LithoView with the component mounted in it.

      • triggerVisibilityEvent

        public static boolean triggerVisibilityEvent(LithoView lithoView,
                                             Class<?> visibilityClass)
        Triggers a Litho visibility event

        The event needs to be one of VisibleEvent, InvisibleEvent, FocusedVisibleEvent, UnfocusedVisibleEvent, or FullImpressionVisibleEvent.

        Parameters:
        lithoView - the view to invoke the event on its component tree
        visibilityClass - the type of the event to invoke
        Returns:
        true if a handler for this event type was found

      • setTreeProp

        public static void setTreeProp(ComponentContext context,
                               Class propClass,
                               Object prop)
        Sets a TreeProp that will be visible to all Components which are created from the given Context (unless a child overwrites its).
